    net.jhoogland.jautomata  

    • Uses of WeightConvergenceCondition in net.jhoogland.jautomata

      Classes in net.jhoogland.jautomata that implement WeightConvergenceCondition 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExactConvergence<K>
      The weight convergence condition that yields true if and only if the previous and current weights are equal according to the weight type's equal(Object) method.
